title: Nostalgia greats
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Nostalgia
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Entertainers
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Excerpts
description: Due to the unique material contained herein, fluctuations may occur in picture and sound quality during the program. Take a trip down memory lane with this compilation of excerpts from some of Hollywood's classic musicals and live performances featuring many of Hollywood's famous stars and entertainers. It includes musical numbers from "Till the Clouds Roll By" (1947), a biopic of Jerome Kern, and includes the "Showboat", "Sally", "Jumbo" and finale sequences featuring Kathryn Grayson, Virginia O'Brien, Lena Horne, Tony Martin and Frank Sinatra. Also features archival footage from the US wartime "Command Performance" with Judy Garland singing "Over the rainbow", and performances by Betty Hutton, and the Andrew Sisters. Other highlights include Maurice Chevalier singing "Louise" and Al Jolson singing "Mammie".
